wikipedia_page.main: Robert Henry Brand, 1st Baron Brand,  (30 October 1878 – 23 August 1963) was a British civil servant and businessman.

response: *Edward Ford (1910-2006), a courtier in the Royal Household of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth II, who married the widow Virginia Brand Polk, daughter of Robert Brand, 1st Baron Brand, in 1949.
* Phyllis Langhorne (1880—1937), who married Robert Brand, 1st Baron Brand.

The Club rapidly grew and was run for many years by the founder members including John Buchan, 1st Baron Tweedsmuir, Robert Brand, 1st Baron Brand and Sir Cuthbert Headlam, 1st Baronet. A collection of papers The Records of the Chatham Dining Club were published in 1915.
